name: Slim'n'buffed Diet
teaser: text here and here and here and here

options.name: Mic dejun (tartine cu branza) ora 8:00
options.teaser: 2 felii de paine integrala , 200g branza slaba (raraul), marar, ceapa, masline

options.name: Mic dejun (ardei umplut cu branza) ora 8:00
options.teaser: 2 ardei grasi umpluti cu 200g branza de vaci slaba (raraul) se amesteca cu marar si putina sare si 2 felii de paine integral

options.name: Mic dejun (salata de fructe cu iaurt grecesc) ora 8:00
options.teaser: ½ banana, 1 kiwi, o portocala mica, 20g fructe de padure, 1 iaurt grecesc, 3 rondele grau integral

options.name: Mic dejun (branza cu iaurt grecesc) ora 8:00
options.teaser: 150g branza slaba de vaci, 50g iaurt grecesc, 50g branza slaba telemea de vaca, 1 rosie, masline, 2 felii de paine integral

options.name: Mic dejun (omleta cu legume) ora 8:00
options.teaser: 3 albusuri, 1 galbenus, legume(ardei gras, rosii, masline), 50g branza slaba telemea de vaca, 2 felii de paine integral

options.name: Mic dejun (rondele expandate(sanovita) de grau integral) ora 9:00
options.teaser: 3 rondele de grau, 20g unt de arahide natural, ½ banana

options.name: Mic dejun (cereale cu lapte) ora 9:00
options.teaser: 30g fulgi de ovaz integrali (lasati in lapte 2 ore sa se hidrateze), 20g mix seminte crude, o lingurita miere, ½ banana, 100g lapte

options.name: Masa 2 (omleta cu legume) ora 12:00
options.teaser: text here

options.name: Masa 2 (vita cu brocoli si paste) ora 12:00
options.teaser: 30g paste integrale, 200g vita la gratar, 100g brocoli fiert

options.name: Masa 2 (dorada la cuptor cu cartofi si legume) ora 12:00
options.teaser: 100g cartofi fierti, 150g dorada la gratar, ciuperci, ardei gras, rosii cherry, morcov

options.name: Masa 2 (Ton cu porumb si ou) ora 12:00
options.teaser: o conserva de ton in suc propriu, 1 ou fiert, 10g porumb, rosii cherry, rucola, ardei gras, ceapa verde, dressing din iaurt 0.1% grasime si 2 felii de paine integral

options.name: Masa 2 (piept de rata cu cartofi natur) ora 12:00
options.teaser: 200g piept de rata la gratar, 100g cartofi natur (se pot pisa,adauga iaurt grecesc si sare)

options.name: Masa 2 (curcan cu orez sarbesc) ora 14:00
options.teaser: 30g orez integral, 200g piept de curcan fiert, ardei gras, ceapa, 20g mazare, morcov, ciuperci (legumele se calesc in apa)

options.name: Masa 2 (paste integrale cu branza) ora 14:00
options.teaser: 30g paste integrale, 200g branza de vaci slaba, sare

options.name: Masa 3 (piept de curcan cu orez) ora 16:00
options.teaser: 200g piept de curcan la gratar, 30g orez integral, sos soia pentru gust

options.name: Masa 3 ( somon cu legume ) ora 16:00
options.teaser: 150g somon la gratar, 200g mix de legume fierte si 30g orez integral

options.name: Masa 3 (piept de curcan cu orez) ora 16:00
options.teaser: 200g piept de curcan, 30g orez integral, sos soia

options.name: Masa 3 (orez cu creveti) ora 16:00
options.teaser: 200g creveti fierti, 30g orez integral

options.name: Masa 3 (somon cu legume in sos de portocala) ora 16:00
options.teaser: 150g somon la tava, 1 cartof mediu-mic, 50g legume (se pun toate in tava si se pune cam un cm de suc natural de portocale in care se pregatesc preparatele)

options.name: Masa 3 (muschi de vita la cuptor cu cartofi natur) ora 18:00
options.teaser: 200g muschi de vita la cuptor (cimbru, chimen, sare, piper), 150g cartofi natur (se pot pisa si se adauga iaurt grecesc si sare)

options.name: Masa 3 (supa de vita cu legume) ora 18:00
options.teaser: 200g muschi de vita, 30g taitei integrali, morcov, mazare, ceapa

options.name: Masa 4 (vita cu legume) ora 21:00 (DUPA SALA – VALABIL ZILNIC)
options.teaser: 200g vita la cuptor, 200g mix de legume la cuptor

options.name: Masa 4 (urda cu masline si salata) ora 21:00
options.teaser: 200g urda slaba, 20g masline, salata (ardei, castraveti, salata)

options.name: Masa 4 (pastrav la gratar cu legume) ora 21:00
options.teaser: 200g pastrav la gratar, 200g mix de legume

options.name: Masa 4 (branza de vaci cu masline nesarate) ora 21:00
options.teaser: 100g branza de vaci slaba (raraul), 50g iaurt grecesc, 50g masline nesarate

options.name: Masa 4 (urda slaba cu masline) ora 21:00
options.teaser: 200g urda slaba, 50g masline, 1 rosie

options.name: Masa 4 (tartine cu branza) ora 22:00
options.teaser: 2 felii de paine integral, 150g branza slaba (raraul), marar, ceapa, masline

options.name: Masa 4 (ton cu porumb) ora 22:00
options.teaser: 200g ton in suc propriu, 50g porumb
